$$._: Capillary electrophoresis has matured into a highly sensitive and widely applied analytical method over the last forty years. Here we combine text mining and computational chemistry to paint, with very broad strokes, the applicability and trends in the scientific literature on capillary electrophoresis, simultaneously demonstrating that this is not only possible, but reveal both expected and unexpected details of this history. All software and data are freely available on GitHub (
Capillary electrophoresis has matured into a highly sensitive analytical method.
Text mining in combination with computational chemistry revealed the applicability of capillary electrophoresis techniques.
Major trends included application to DNA sequencing in the 1990s and 2000s, and metabolomics in the 2010s.
The analyses also revealed specific strengths of different flavors of CE and related techniques such as MECC/MEKC.
